ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Digest Number 618
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all! I m also a Beta tester. I m 51. I was reading the posts on the Beta website and the oldest person is 64, (so far), so all ages enjoy the game. Hope you
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all!

I'm also a Beta tester. I'm 51. I was reading the posts on the Beta website
and the oldest person is 64, (so far), so all ages enjoy the game. Hope you
are wrong about people not playing because of difficulty getting hooked up.
Can you buy the network adapter online? I haven't started yet. When they
send the disks I'll get the adapter but I'm wondering if it will be hard to
find here in Hawaii. If they were smart they would make sure places like
Wal-Mart had em.

See ya in the game!
Steve



Politics is the show business of industry. --Frank Zappa
----- Original Message -----
From: "Steven R. Hulse" <steveh@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, October 31, 2002 7:05 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Digest Number 618


> Hey cool a fellow Beta tester! I got into it also, I'm really
> excited!
>
> Well I don't know about it being a "kid's platform" I'm 33 and think
> it will do great on the PS2. The only thing I think there might be
> issues with regarding it's survival is the whol PS2 online part. I
> don't know if there will be too many people that will get the adapter
> or allow their kids to go online with it. Didn't Nintendo or another
> gaming console maker try that a few years back but it failed?
> Personally there were times I wish I had EQ for my PS2 simply to free
> up my PC for other things. Like I can play EQ all day and the wife
> won't have to yell at me to get off the PC so she can use it! LOL
>
> You said a regular USB keyboard will work on the PS2? Thats cool, I
> have one so now I won't have to go buy the PS2 specific one. You know
> what would be great, if you could use those little USB storage
> devices to save info on! God that would rock!
>
> BTW since your also in the Beta, you can PM me anytime and we can
> chat about the game. :)
>
>
>
> Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
>
>
> Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
>
>
